content.title: Chronic Aortic Dissection
content.description: Management of aortic dissection beyond the acute phase (>14 days)

key_concepts.details: Dissection present >14 days from symptom onset
Regular imaging to monitor for aneurysmal degeneration (CTA/MRA annually)
Total aortic diameter >55-60mm, rapid growth >5mm/year, symptoms
Open repair or TEVAR/FEVAR depending on extent and anatomy

content.clinical_significance: Up to 25% require late intervention for aneurysmal degeneration
